sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactory_Name,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'@{item().name}' as Source,
'@{substring(item().name,0,lastindexof(item().name,'_'))}' as Destination,

'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerId}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.rowsCopied}' as rowsCopied,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.usedParallelCopies}' as No_ParallelCopies,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.copyDuration}' as copyDuration_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.executionDetails[0].source.type}' as Source_Type,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.executionDetails[0].sink.type}' as Sink_Type,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as Execution_Status,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivity_Start_Time,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivity_End_Time,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivity_queuingDuration_in_secs,
'@{activity('Copy data1').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivity_transferDuration_in_secs

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select TABLE_NAME from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME not in ('daily_load_Recon_Status',
'summary','pipeline_log','Customer_Dim','Customer_Dim1','Customer_Dim2','database_firewall_rules','')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM item().Table_Name 
WHERE ModifiedDate >= '@{pipeline().parameters.triggerstart}'
AND ModifiedDate < '@{pipeline().parameters.triggerend}'

scriptLines: derivedColumn1, derivedColumn3 exists(source1@CustomerID == source2@CustomerID && hashkey == s2_hashkey,
